contextId.information: Paul speaks about good deeds as if they were objects that God could place in front of people. AT: "that God prepared for them to do" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_metaphor]])

verseBefore: Huu ni ujumbe wa kuaminika. Ninawataka myanene kwa ujasiri mambo haya , ili kwamba wale wanaomwamini Mungu wawe na dhamira juu ya kazi nzuri ambayo aliiweka mbele yao. Mambo haya ni mazuri na yanafaida kwa ajili ya watu wote. TEST
